    CommonKanbanBoardsService

    ConvertUtils class that will be used to convert DTOs to Entities convert Entities to DTOs
    CustomGeneralHandler
    General exception Handler that will : - catch custom exceptions and, - return an HTTP response containing an Error with an error code.
    DatabaseFetchException
    Custom Exception for handling Database errors.
    DeleteKanbanBoardsService
    Service used for : deleting one KanbanBoard, many/all KanbanBoards
    DeleteKanbanCardsService
    Service used for : deleting one KanbanCard, many/all KanbanCards
    DeleteKanbanSectionsService
    Service used for : deleting one KanbanSection, many/all KanbanSections
    ErrorResponse
    Custom error that can be returned by the API.
    ErrorResponseArgs
    Custom error that can be returned by the API, including a list of missing parameters.
    GetKanbanBoardsService
    Service used for : getting one KanbanBoard, many/all KanbanBoards
